articles.description: The device will allegedly arrive in two versions - one with 240W wired charging and another with 150W charging. Realme is gearing up to launch its latest...
articles.content: Realme is gearing up to launch its latest GT5 smartphone and we got official confirmation from the brands Weibo profile as well as our first look at the device thanks to a leaked spy shot. Realme con… [+819 chars]
